ClassMembers.name: Logger
ClassMembers.summary: Static class used for thread-safe logging. Writes timestamped log entries into per-day log files under the application Log directory.

ClassMembers.name: SafeExecutor
ClassMembers.summary: Static utility class responsible for safely executing synchronous and asynchronous actions with standardized error handling.

ClassMembers.name: IConnectionFactory
ClassMembers.summary: Interface for defining a factory class for a specific database connection creation.

ClassMembers.name: SqlServerConnectionFactory
ClassMembers.summary: Factory class for creating and initializing connections to the SQL Server database using configuration settings.

ClassMembers.name: IDBEntity
ClassMembers.summary: Interface defining the contract for database entities, ensuring they possess a unique identifier.

ClassMembers.name: Book
ClassMembers.summary: Represents a book entity in the library, containing details such as title, price, stock availability, and relationships to authors and genres.

ClassMembers.name: Author
ClassMembers.summary: Represents an author entity, storing the author's name and unique ID.

ClassMembers.name: Genre
ClassMembers.summary: Represents a genre entity, storing the genre category name and unique ID.

ClassMembers.name: Customer
ClassMembers.summary: Represents a customer entity, storing personal details and contact email.

ClassMembers.name: Loan
ClassMembers.summary: Represents a loan transaction entity, tracking the book, customer, loan status, dates, and price. Contains logic for updating status based on dates.

ClassMembers.name: DAOBase
ClassMembers.summary: Abstract base class for Data Access Objects. Provides a common structure and helper methods for database operations on entities.

ClassMembers.name: BookDAO
ClassMembers.summary: Data Access Object for handling database operations related to Books. Manages specific book-related operations and relation synchronization (Authors/Genres).

ClassMembers.name: AuthorDAO
ClassMembers.summary: Data Access Object for handling database operations related to Authors.

ClassMembers.name: GenreDAO
ClassMembers.summary: Data Access Object for handling database operations related to Genres.

ClassMembers.name: CustomerDAO
ClassMembers.summary: Data Access Object for handling database operations related to Customers.

ClassMembers.name: LoanDAO
ClassMembers.summary: Data Access Object for handling database operations related to Loans. Manages complex loan logic including stock adjustments and tracking returned items.

ClassMembers.name: EntityControlBase
ClassMembers.summary: Abstract base class for UserControls that manage database entities. Handles common tasks like data loading, adding, updating, and deleting items safely.

ClassMembers.name: BookControl
ClassMembers.summary: UI Control for managing the collection of books. Allows viewing, adding, editing, and deleting books, as well as managing their authors and genres.

ClassMembers.name: AuthorControl
ClassMembers.summary: UI Control for managing the collection of authors. Allows listing, adding, and deleting authors.

ClassMembers.name: GenreControl
ClassMembers.summary: UI Control for managing the collection of genres. Allows listing, adding, and deleting genres.

ClassMembers.name: CustomerControl
ClassMembers.summary: UI Control for managing the collection of customers. Allows listing, adding, editing, and deleting customers.

ClassMembers.name: LoanControl
ClassMembers.summary: UI Control for managing loan transactions. Allows creating new loans, viewing ongoing and returned loans, and updating loan statuses.

ClassMembers.name: MainMenuControl
ClassMembers.summary: UI Control for the main menu navigation. Provides buttons to navigate to different entity management views.

ClassMembers.name: ConnectionWindow
ClassMembers.summary: Startup window that handles the initial database connection process. Provides feedback on connection status and options to reload or close.

ClassMembers.name: MainWindow
ClassMembers.summary: The main application window that hosts the various entity management controls.
